short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be aware of the time you spent scrolling on those infinity-scroll websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reclaim your time and mind!

The extension keeps track of how much you scroll and will notify you when you have scrolled more than the configured amount on a given page.

You can see how much scrolled in the extension's popup.
You can configure the duration between popup notifications.
It saves you from becoming a scrolling zombie!
